title: Sakamoto desu ga?
alternative_title: Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto, 坂本ですが？
description: The story follows the daily life of the "coolest" high school student, Sakamoto. As soon as he transfers to his new school, he attracts the attention of not just his class but the whole student body, and his jealous classmates' attempts to bully him repeatedly backfire and instead make Sakamoto look cooler.
